pages.text: Appears in:$(li)Kamen Rider Outsiders (2022, web series)

Obtained by using $(l:ex_aid/items/blank_gashat)Unfinished Gashats$(/l) on the $(l:misc/blocks/gamecreator)Game Creator$(/l) while having the $(l:zero_one/items/president_dan_kuroto_progrisekey)Dan Kuroto Progrisekey$(/l) in your inventory
